results.description: Feet on the top of thighs, Spine elongate, mind the knees, and relax the shoulders. Top of the head toward the ceiling and chin slightly down.
Core engaged, inner thigh squeezed, shoulder out, chest open, back straight, crown toward the ceiling.
results.benefits: Cores, back, hip flexor strengthening, hamstring stretching and tones abdominal organs

results.description: Bottom leg straight, upper leg reaching back and up, chest facing forward, arms engage, focus gaze.
results.benefits: Strengthen back, shoulders, arms, hips, and legs

results.description: Big toes together, sitting on the hills, knees open, spine round, belly between thighs, forehead on the floor, shoulder relaxed.
results.benefits: Stretches the spine hips and thighs, calms the nervous system and relieves tiredness
